Back To Recipes

recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

tomato paste 12 ounce
apple cider vinegar 1.5 cup
worcestershire sauce 2 Tbsp
liquid smoke 1 Tbsp
smoked paprika 2 tsp
garlic powder 1 tsp
onion powder 0.5 tsp
sea salt 0.5 tsp
chilli powder 0.25 tsp
cayenne pepper 0.25 tsp
monk fruit 0.125 tsp
water 1.5 cup
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 25 Minutes

Recipe:

Add the following to a sauce pan
> 12 ounces tomato paste
> 1½ cups apple cider vinegar
> 2 Tbsp worcestershire sauce
> 1 Tbsp liquid smoke
> 2 tsp smoked paprika
> 1 tsp garlic powder
> ½ tsp onion powder
> ½ tsp sea salt
> ¼ tsp chilli powder
> ¼ tsp cayenne pepper
> ⅛ tsp monk fruit
> 1½ cups water
Stir with wooden spoon
Put sauce pan on heat 5 until boil (Takes 5 minutes)
Put sauce pan on heat 3 with lid (Takes 20 minutes)
